PATIENT_ID: TEST_VAP_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-15 08:00:00

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-01-15 10:00:00
Patient on mechanical ventilation.
Intubated with ventilator settings: AC mode, TV 450, PEEP 8, FiO2 40%.

[IMAGING] 2026-01-20 08:00:00
CXR: New infiltrate in right lower lobe.
Chest x-ray shows new infiltrate consistent with pneumonia.
CT chest shows consolidation in right lower lobe.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-20 10:00:00
Patient febrile, temperature 39.2 C.
Leukocytosis with WBC greater than 12.
Purulent sputum noted from ETT.
New cough observed during suctioning.
Tachypnea with RR greater than 25.
Ventilator-associated pneumonia suspected.

[LAB] 2026-01-20 11:00:00
Sputum culture positive for Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
BAL positive for same organism.
